title: # [Semi-Auto-NovelAI-to-Pixiv](https://github.com/zhulinyv/Semi-Auto-NovelAI-to-Pixiv) | 半自动 NovelAI 上传 Pixiv

t2i.description: > Equivalent to using NovelAI official website, supporting your favorite style combination. If no image is returned, it's mostly due to 500 (server overload), 429 (request too fast), 443 (unstable node), anyway, it's not my problem ヾ(≧▽≦*)o
t2i.resolution: Resolution (Width x Height) (Be cautious of crystal consumption for high resolutions)
t2i.smdyn: sm_dyn (Enable requires sm to be enabled)

i2i.input_path: Batch Processing Path (Effective only on the computer where this program runs)

random blue picture.description: > Generates a blue picture by randomly combining tags from ./files/favorite.json

random picture.description: > Generates a picture using *.txt files in ./file/prompt as prompts

inpaint.description: > Redraws images using masks (redrawn area is white, remaining is transparent instead of black)
inpaint.input_path: Batch Processing Image Path (Effective only on the computer where this program runs)
inpaint.mask_path: Batch Processing Mask Path (Effective only on the computer where this program runs)

super resolution.description: > Enlarges and denoises images using different engines

mosaic.description: > Automatically applies mosaic to key parts

water mark.description: > Before using, please prepare your own watermarks in ./files/water folder

pixiv.description: > Uploads images or image sets to Pixiv, you can check the upload progress in the command line

selector.description: > Facilitates manual image selection (very simple buttons, should be self-explanatory...)

rm png info.description: > Erase or restore image generation information
rm png info.input_path: Directory of Images to Be Restored

example.positive: [suimya, muririn], artist:ciloranko,[artist:sho_(sho_lwlw)],[[tianliang duohe fangdongye]], [eip (pepai)], [rukako], [[[memmo]]], [[[[[hoshi (snacherubi)]]]]], year 2023, 1girl, cute, loli,
example.negative: nsfw, lowres, {bad}, error, fewer, extra, missing, worst quality, jpeg artifacts, bad quality, watermark, unfinished, displeasing, chromatic aberration, signature, extra digits, artistic error, username, scan, [abstract],

description.t2i_cool_time: Cooling time for Text-to-Image (in seconds, fluctuates within 6 seconds)
description.pixiv_cookie: Cookie used for uploading to Pixiv
description.pixiv_token: x-csrf-token used for uploading to Pixiv
description.allow_tag_edit: Whether to allow other users to edit tags
description.caption_prefix: Prefix for descriptions when uploading to Pixiv
description.rep_tags: Whether to shuffle and replace some tags in Pixiv descriptions
description.rep_tags_per: How much to replace (default is 0.5 for replacing half)
description.pixiv_cool_time: Cooling time for uploading to Pixiv (in minutes, fluctuates within 5 minutes)
description.neighbor: Side length of square mosaic relative to image
description.meta_data: Information added when clearing meta data
description.alpha: Opacity of watermark (0~1, larger values mean more transparent)
description.position: Possible positions where watermark may appear
